metadata.feature_description: Generate RSS feed for activity stream content

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Generate RSS feed for community activity stream

steps.action: Navigate to Community page with Activity Stream
steps.expected: Activity Stream page loads with posts visible
steps.actual: Community page loaded successfully with activity stream posts and RSS icon visible

steps.action: Locate RSS Feed icon at bottom of activity stream
steps.expected: RSS Feed icon (small RSS symbol) visible next to 'Get More' button
steps.actual: RSS Feed icon visible and accessible at bottom right of activity stream, next to 'Get More' button

steps.action: Click RSS Feed icon to open RSS feed in new tab
steps.expected: Valid RSS 2.0 XML feed opens in new tab with activity stream content
steps.actual: RSS feed opened in new tab displaying valid RSS 2.0 XML with channel metadata (title, link, language, pubDate, generator) and multiple item elements containing activity posts

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Generate RSS feed for group activity

steps.action: Navigate to Wiki Test Group activity page
steps.expected: Group activity page loads with group-specific posts
steps.actual: Group activity page loaded with Wiki Test Group content, showing group-specific posts and wiki article entries

steps.action: Locate and scroll to RSS Feed icon on group page
steps.expected: RSS Feed icon visible at bottom of group activity stream
steps.actual: RSS Feed icon visible at bottom of group activity stream with URL containing groupId parameter

steps.action: Click RSS Feed icon to open group RSS feed
steps.expected: Valid RSS 2.0 XML feed opens with group-specific content only
steps.actual: RSS feed opened showing valid RSS 2.0 XML with group-specific namespace, channel link pointing to group activity page, and items containing only group posts (wiki article with tags, group posts)

steps.expected: RSS 2.0 compliant XML format with proper elements
steps.actual: RSS feed contains: rss version 2.0, channel with xmlns:journal and xmlns:slash namespaces, title 'My Website Most recent journals', language en-US, pubDate, lastBuildDate, docs, generator 'Journal RSS Generator Version 10.1.1.87', and multiple item elements with title, link, description, author, comments, guid, and pubDate

observations: RSS Feed icon is styled as a 20x20px background image (rss.png) that floats to the right
RSS feed URL format for community: /en-us/Community/view/rssfeed
RSS feed URL format for groups: /en-us/Community/Groups/Activity/view/rssfeed/groupId/{id}
RSS feed supports optional query parameters: groupid, pagesize, journaltypeid, includebody
RSS feed generator is 'Journal RSS Generator Version 10.1.1.87'
Group RSS feeds include category tags from wiki articles
RSS feed items include slash:comments element for comment counts
